## colorManipulator.asHexString() function

### colorManipulator.asHexString() function

Converts a color to hex6 format if there is no alpha, hex8 if there is.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function asHexString(color: string): string;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { colorManipulator } from '@grafana/data';
const { asHexString } = colorManipulator;
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  color | <code>string</code> | Hex, RGB, HSL color |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

A hex color string, i.e. \#ff0000 or \#ff0000ff
